channel.title: News on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in News on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite new version out now
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts lite, my free WordPress plugin which adds animated grid layouts to your website has been updated.

item.title: Introducing empty Apache Ant Build for WordPress
item.description: Welcome and say hello to empty. empty is a bunch of ANT Build Tasks for WordPress plugin developers that help automate the build thanks to Apache Ant.

item.title: Teaser - Visual Layouts Pro (freetile)
item.description: Development has finished on my next plugin - Visual Layouts Pro (Freetile) plugin.

item.title: Pro Plugin - New User Guides & Support tools
item.description: Until a few days ago, I’d been relying on e-mail to manage your support requests.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite - gets an update & a new name
item.description: WordPress is a great tool for Websites, Blogs, Ecommerce and pretty much anything else - Which is why Isotope Visual Layouts is such a great plugin.

item.title: Just Announced: Isotope Visual Layouts plugin gets Filtrify for tags and filtering
item.description: Visual Layouts Filtrify is my newest plugin for WordPress and my first plugin to extend Isotope Visual Post Layouts.

item.title: WordPress 3.5 - Welcome! My plugins are tested and working.
item.description: In case you hadn’t noticed — WordPress 3.5 is here. This release has one great new feature - the replacement for the media library and the drag n drop uploader has changed.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts v1.0 is coming
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts my plugin for WordPress will soon be updated to version 1.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts for WordPress plugin - v1.0 is coming
item.description: First — thanks for your ‘patience’ Isotope Visual Layouts for WordPress will soon be turning 1.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - WordPress database backup - Here comes version 2.1
item.description: DBC Backup 2 for WordPress database backup has just been updated.

item.title: Google+: still not as interesting as Pinterest <<- why does everyone want it fail?
item.description: Comment - Seems to me that ‘everyone’ wants to find a fault with Google+ and many maybe ‘wishing’ it to fail.

item.title: I'm moving - migrating to a new domain (some glitches)
item.description: Well it had to happen - I’ve found a better domain damien.

item.title: Remember to add my Google+ Page
item.description: Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add Damien’s Google+ page.

item.title: Thank You - 47% growth YOY - 31,000 visitors and 14,000 presentation views
item.description: What a year 2011 was … over 31,000 people visited my site which is a growth of about 47% year on year.

item.title: WordPress 3.3 RC3 - This has to be it
item.description: The third and final release candidate of WordPress 3.3 is here.

item.title: Please add my Google+ page [PROMO]
item.description: Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add the new page for White T-Shirt Digital

item.title: WordPress 3.2 Release Candidate 3
item.description: The third and possibly final release candidate of WordPress 3.2 is here.

item.title: Back from holidays - what projects do you need help with?
item.description: So after a several weeks holiday - as of now, I’m a free agent looking for new work and a new project to get stuck into.

item.title: On holiday - back next week
item.description: Hi everyone - I hope your June is going well? I’ve been away on holiday for the past week taking some time to visit colleagues and friends in Madrid.

item.title: Remember to add my Google+ Page
item.description: Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add Damien’s Google+ page.

item.title: Social Media News this morning November 24, 2010
item.description: Best deals may be in your phone Retailers and malls are ramping up their efforts on social media and mobile marketing, giving savvy shoppers another tool.

item.title: 20,000 visitors so far this year
item.description: So its mid-November and I’m just looking at the Google Analytics report to see how I’m getting on.

item.title: Social Media News this morning November 22, 2010
item.description: Why your smart phone is Santa's best little helper At the same time, software applications and social media have become feeding frenzies for consumers to share their finds, seek another opinion or just get -

item.title: Announcing Cambridge Startup Weekend December 10 - 12
item.description: Cambridge Startup Weekend (http://cambridge.startupweekend.org) will take place December 10 – 11 - 12 2010 in just over 6 weeks at the Hauser Forum in Cambridge.

item.title: UK Agency Mobile Interactive Group (MIG) ranked Number One in the 2010 Deloitte Technology Fast 50
item.description: UK Mobile Agency, Mobile Interactive Group (MIG) today announced that it ranked Number One in the 2010 Deloitte Technology Fast 50, a ranking of the 50 fastest growing technology companies in the UK.
